info.name: Discount Codes API
info.description: API endpoints for discount codes - dynamic and manageable from dashboard

request.description:
Get all active and valid discount codes.

**Features:**
- Public endpoint (no authentication required)
- Returns only active codes
- Filters out expired codes (valid_to < today)
- Sorted by created_at (descending)
- Dynamic - codes can be changed anytime from dashboard

**Response includes:**
- id
- subject
- code
- discount_amount
- discount_formatted
- valid_to (date)
- valid_to_formatted
- is_expired (boolean)
- is_active (boolean)
- status (active/inactive)
- image (full URL)
- image_url (storage path)
- external_url (if exists)
- created_at

request.description:
Get a specific discount code by its code string.

**Features:**
- Public endpoint (no authentication required)
- Returns code only if active and not expired
- Case-insensitive code lookup
- Returns 404 if code not found or expired

**Usage:**
- Validate discount codes before applying
- Show code details to users
- Check if code is still valid
